content: **camp bottle holder** is a very simple crochet pattern the pattern contains only basic crochet techniques just one day is enough to create a practical camp bottle holder - the perfect travel companion **what do you need ** - 55g macrame cotton from yarnart 1 skein = 250g 225m - 4 5 mm crochet hook - tapestry needle - scissor - marker - 2 carabiners #campbottleholder
